problem: Water is in which phase when the pressure is 0.01 atm and the temperature is (a) 90°C, (b) −20°C?

steps.explanation: Identify the approach: use the water phase diagram to determine the phase at given pressure and temperature coordinates
steps.notations: Method: Locate points (P, T) on phase diagram

steps.explanation: Locate the point (0.01 atm, 90°C) on the phase diagram
steps.notations: At (0.01 atm, 90°C): This point falls in the vapor region

steps.explanation: Locate the point (0.01 atm, −20°C) on the phase diagram
steps.notations: At (0.01 atm, −20°C): This point falls in the solid region

solution:
Using the water phase diagram:
(a) At P = 0.01 atm and T = 90°C:
This point is in the vapor region
Phase: vapor

(b) At P = 0.01 atm and T = −20°C:
This point is in the solid region
Phase: solid
